channel.title: Server randomly shut off need help asap
channel.description: my server just randomly shut off, i have about 20 players and more than half are pissed, i checked canyouseeme, my port is still open, i get no errors when running, and when compiling. there is no errors at all when running. but no one is able to connect. says "error connecting to server"

item.title: Server randomly shut off need help asap
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

what do you mean reset no ip? righ tnow it says its not working. how can i fix? it says “error connecting”

Read full topic
item.source: Server randomly shut off need help asap

item.title: Server randomly shut off need help asap
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

It’s most likely your NO-IP. Refresh it and it should be fine, just be sure to reload your client before logging back in after reseting your NO-IP.

Read full topic
item.source: Server randomly shut off need help asap

item.title: Server randomly shut off need help asap
item.dc:creator: @EclipseRuins EclipseRuins
item.description:
@EclipseRuins wrote:

pray4urlife:

That was to the eclipse person…

Yes, i’m having the same issue as BrandonTan, My server was working fine and one day it randomly stopped, its hosted on a VPS and all. When someone clicks log-in it directly just says, “Error Connecting to Server” its doesn’t even have the few seconds where it says, “Connecting…” or, “Logging In…” Just directly says, “Error Connecting to Server” As if it never even sends out the signal to connect to the server.

Read full topic
item.source: Server randomly shut off need help asap

item.title: Server randomly shut off need help asap
item.dc:creator: @pray4urlife pray4urlife
item.description:
@pray4urlife wrote:

[quote=“EclipseRuins, post:3, topic:434615”]I have this issue too where it says, “Error Connecting” immediately when someone tries to log-in. Doesn’t even spend time trying to connect.

(BUMP) Please.[/quote]Have you portforward?
